definitions.definition: The principal phospholipid in animals; it is particularly abundant in egg yolks , and is extracted commercially from soy . It is a major constituent of cell membranes , and is commonly used as a food additive (as an emulsifier ).

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) The principal phospholipid in animals; it is particularly abundant in egg yolks , and is extracted commercially from soy . It is a major constituent of cell membranes , and is commonly used as a food additive (as an emulsifier ).
